code: import axios from'axios';import{message}from'antd';export default function ajax(url){var data=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};var type=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'GET';return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var promise;if(type==='GET'){promise=axios.get(url,{params:data});}else{promise=axios.post(url,data);}promise.then(function(response){resolve(response.data);}).catch(function(error){message.error('Request error: '+error.message);});});}
